director.name: 玛鲁薇拉·马特利 Manuela Martelli

introduction: TEAM #1 THE PLAIN OF PATIENCEA film by Ignacio Rodriguez (Chile) and Sara Rastegar (Iran / France)2015 – Chile / France – 16min30 – color – 1.85 – DCPSYNOPSISTwo old friends meet after 40 years to unearth a treasure they had buried in the desert.CASTLucho Jose Soza, Jaime Jaime VadelTEAM #2 MAREA DE TIERRAA film by Manuela Martelli (Chile) and Amirah Tajdin (Kenya / Dubai)2015 – Chile / France – 13mn – color – 1.66 – DCPSYNOPSISLaura, a heartbroken teenager from Santiago is on holiday in the southern Chilean archipelago of Chiloe with friends. As she wanders the lonely island seascapes she encounters a group of local seaweed collector women, with whom she shares places and stories.CASTLaura López, Rosa Garcia-Huidobro, Roberto Sanhueza, Maritza Ampuero, Lidia Cárcamo, Bárbara TorresTEAM #3 LA DISCOTHEQUEA film by Teresita Ugarte (Chile) and Ofir Raul Graizer (Israel / Germany)2015 – Chile / France – 14mn – color – 1.85 – DCPSYNOPSISAn old man spends a night in a Strip Club in downtown Santiago. Through his encounter with music, bodies and alcohol, his true nature will be revealed.CASTINGTomás Vidiella, Renata Jeniffer PeñaTEAM #4 NECESSITO SABERA film by Matias Rojas Valencia (Chile) and Mariko Saga (Japan / Poland)2015 – Chile / France – 16mn30 – color – 1.85 – DCPSYNOPSISMaria, a doctor from Santiago serves in a rural hospital in Southern Chile. When 12 years-old Paola visits the hospital, Maria finds out about her terrible secret. Suspecting a family drama, Maria decides to follow the girl to her home…CASTINGBlanca Lewin, Antonia Conejeros Chavez, Paula Zuñiga, Luis Dubo
